Articles.Content:
Hello,

I'm new in the forum after i fell in love of KBS ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

i hope we will have fun alltogether.
Hi mozaik. You will soon put all the pieces together and get the big picture. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
Welcome! Enjoy your time here, if there's anything you need we're here!
